results.title: Gemini announces exit from UK, EU, Australia, slashes workforce
results.description: Gemini, a US-based cryptocurrency exchange founded in 2015, will focus on growth in the United States due to its deep capital markets.

results.title: Bitcoin slips under $64K as record-high selling intensifies: Where is the price bottom?
results.description: Bitcoin touched new lows under $64,000 as market selling reached a historic level, and analysts warn that the bottom is not in. Does data support analysts’ sub-$60,000 prediction?

results.title: Myriad Moves: How Low Will Bitcoin and Ethereum Go?
results.description: Top markets on Myriad this week include predictions on Bitcoin and Ethereum’s next respective stops, plus the outcome of Super Bowl LX.

results.title: Tether backs Anchorage Digital in $100M equity investment
results.description: The investment extends an existing partnership with Anchorage and comes as the federally regulated crypto bank explores a major capital raise ahead of a potential IPO.

results.title: Bitcoin spirals toward $65,000, heading to worst one-day drawdown since FTX blowup
results.description: Analyst points to the 200-day moving average — currently around $58,000 to $60,000 — as a potential support level to watch.

results.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
results.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

results.title: Bitcoin is the third most oversold ever, says one indicator, and violent upside could be next
results.description: The Relative Strength Index (RSI), a popular technical trading indicator, has plunged to 17. Only the bear market bottom in 2018 and the 2020 Covid crash saw lower reads.

results.title: Strategy ($MSTR) Falls 15% as Investors Brace for Earnings Call
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Strategy ($MSTR) Falls 15% as Investors Brace for Earnings Call Shares of Strategy ($MSTR) dropped sharply today, tumbling more than 15 % in heavy trading as Bitcoin continued to sell-off. This post Strategy ($MSTR) Falls 15% as Investors Brace for Earnings Call first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: JPMorgan: Bitcoin is Now a More Attractive Investment Than Gold Long Term
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine JPMorgan: Bitcoin is Now a More Attractive Investment Than Gold Long Term JPMorgan says Bitcoin’s long-term case versus gold is strengthening despite its historic sell-off. results.title: The v2 Transport: Bitcoin P2P Traffic Goes Dark
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine The v2 Transport: Bitcoin P2P Traffic Goes Dark From The Core Issue: Learn about the v2 transport protocol upgrade from 2024 that aims to keep your nodes internet traffic private from snooping. This post The v2 Transport: Bitcoin P2P Traffic Goes Dark first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Pieter Wuille.

results.title: Tom Lee's BitMine Hits 7-Month Stock Low as Ethereum Paper Losses Reach $8 Billion
results.description: Shares in publicly traded Ethereum treasury firm BitMine Immersion Technologies have fallen to a seven-month low as unrealized losses mount.

results.title: Elite Scientists Admit AI Now Does Most of Their Thinking
results.description: At a closed-door meeting in Princeton, leading researchers said agentic AI tools now handle up to 90% of their intellectual workload—forcing a reckoning over who, or what, drives scientific discovery.

results.title: Bitcoin Crash Could Deepen to $38K, Say Analysts—Here's Why
results.description: Bitcoin has already tumbled far from its October high, but history suggests the rout could deepen before momentum shifts, according to Stifel.

results.title: Treasury Secretary: Crypto 'Nihilists' Who Say They Don't Need Clarity Act 'Should Move to El Salvador'
results.description: Scott Bessent also appeared to empathize with the banking lobby’s concerns about the bill during Senate testimony on Thursday.

results.title: Three signs that Bitcoin price could be near ‘full capitulation’
results.description: Panic selling by short-term holders, extreme fear, and oversold RSI suggested that BTC could be nearing the final phase of capitulation.

results.title: U.S. Treasury's Bessent calls out crypto 'nihilists' resisting market structure bill
results.description: Treasury Secretary Bessent said market participants who don't want strong regulation should "move to El Salvador."

results.title: Aster layer-1 blockchain testnet goes live, mainnet rollout targeted for Q1
results.description: Aster rebranded to become a crypto perpetual futures decentralized exchange in 2025, as perp DEX trading volume surged by trillions of dollars.

results.title: Ether slips below $2K as ETH holder confidence faces major stress test
results.description: Ether is testing holder conviction with its price dip, with data showing continued selling by smaller holders and steady accumulation by larger investors.

results.title: Tom Lee's Bitmine now $8 billion underwater as ether tumbles below $2,000
results.description: Despite its mounting losses and plunging share price, the ether treasury firm says it's under no pressure to sell its holdings.

results.title: Polymarket, Circle partner in shift to native USDC settlement
results.description: Polymarket will migrate from bridged USDC on Polygon to Circle-issued native USDC, reducing reliance on cross-chain bridges as prediction markets expand.

results.title: Senator Lummis to Work With Treasury on Bitcoin Tax Guidance, Hints At Potential Exemption
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Senator Lummis to Work With Treasury on Bitcoin Tax Guidance, Hints At Potential Exemption In hearings today, Senator Lummis signaled willingness to work with Treasury on clearer Bitcoin tax guidance, including a potential de minimis exemption. This post Senator Lummis to Work With Treasury on Bitcoin Tax Guidance, Hints At Potential Exemption first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Gemini to exit U.K., EU and Australia, reduce staff by 25%, and focus on U.S. and prediction markets
results.description: The crypto exchange has instructed affected customers to sign up with eToro by the end of March for withdrawals, while deposits and new accounts have been suspended.

results.description: Publicly traded crypto exchange Gemini is exiting foreign markets and laying off around 25% of its staff to improve its path to profitability.

results.description: XRP crashes 15% as crypto markets plunge into "Extreme Fear" territory, wiping out over $1.4 billion in value for traders.

results.title: Bitcoin Falls Over $59,000 in Largest Drawdown Ever, Down Nearly 47% From All-Time High

results.title: Sovcombank says it's the first Russian bank to offer bitcoin-backed loans to public
results.description: Larger rival Sberbank beat Sovcombank to the punch, but it's still running as a pilot program.

results.title: Solana Foundation's Liu: Focus on finance, not gaming 'misadventures'

results.title: Tom Lee's Bitmine may be buying ETH, but Vitalik Buterin and everyone else appears to be selling
